FrontEnd

Class ProfessorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • FrontEnd.ProfessorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OurStyle, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class ProfessorView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements OurStyle
    Provides the data fields and methods to create a GUI for a professor.
    Since:
    April 11, 2018
    Version:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        proffFirstName - - the professor's first name
        proffLastName - - the professor's last name
